name: rr-elrnmpt2d

body.origin:

-| wi(wcel(c1, crn(c3)), wrex(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))

body.origin:

-| wceq(c3, cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
